name: trippy dippy pinball
description:
y'all, i am not going to lie. this pinball game is super janky.

if your idea of relaxing and unwinding is looking at beautiful, colorful, hand-drawn pieces of art while a ball bounces around your screen, this might be your next game purchase. 

thank you for supporting my art. 

<3, 

carol

note: the launch spring breaks and flippers behave erratically on low and very low graphics settings.
